item.description:
Did you pile the mashed potatoes too high? Eat one too many slices of pumpkin pie? Did the gravy boat overflow onto your plate? Come out for a briskly paced hike to burn off some of those turkey dinner calories!

Please bring water and be prepared to cover 2 - 3 miles of moderately difficulty trails. Meet at Headquarters at 194 Cranberry Road. Sponsored by the Massachusetts Department of Conservation and Recreation, this program is free and open to the public. For adults and older children who can walk at a moderate pace (or at least who could prior to the Thanksgiving dinner).

Rain or snow cancels. For more information, call (508) 866-2580 x163.

For more information on Myles Standish State Forest, visit http://www.mass.gov/dcr/parks/southeast/mssf.htm.

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: DCR's Too Much Turkey Hike
